column5: In case you thought it was all paintin---and general smarta** outlooks  Took my son out on this past weekend to catch some fish to eat---he was giving lessons this day.  Bushart
Doesn't look like anybody went away hungry from that fish fry!!!
Great Report. Some nice largies! I figured this heat wave would really turn on the LM.
Great report and pics bushart  Good looking bass! Thanks for sharing Leechman
Those are some big largemouth! Personally i think they are better eating than smallmouth.  Thanks for sharing, ehg
